Question.Subject: Online Shoppers! I need your help!?
Question.Content: I am in need of a item it is called a Hauppauge 1212 HD-PVR High Definition Personal Video Recorder. But, everywhere online it's back ordered until early March! I really need some help to find a website that has them in stock. Amazon is sold out to. Saying(Usually ships in 2 to 4 weeks) is their way of saying we are sold out.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Well, the one that I know that has, is this one:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0018LX0DY?ie=UTF8&tag=amazon0be-20&linkCode=as2&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B0018LX0DY
Not sure if you already took a look there but I decided to tell you anyway in case you had not looked here yet.
